name: Ants (itch) (nostram)
description:
This project was for Ludum Dare 50: Delay the Inevitable.  

Squash the ants before they get to your picnic basket and take all of your food.

To play point mouse at the ants and left click.  You can also grab the Ketchup, Wine bottle or salt and pepper and move them to  block the ants.

This game was made with Unreal Engine 4.27.
